title: Salmon coulibiac
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '110g (4 oz) mushrooms, sliced', '85g (3 oz) butter', '85g (3 oz) long grain rice', '225ml (8 fl oz) stock', '225g (8 oz) cooked salmon, flaked', '2 hard boiled eggs, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '380g (13 1/2 oz) puff pastry', 'beaten egg, for glazing']
